p1: The use of the render and skipCompWrap properties isn't very meaningful.
p2: Just think about it, the purpose of using a component library is to simplify development, not to rewrite components.
p3: On the other hand, the dropOldClass and variables properties are more practical.
p4: The dropOldClass property can remove the base class names. For example, <Button className="btn btn-info"> would be modified to <Button className="btn-info">.
p5: Meanwhile, the variables property allows us to customize CSS variables, enhancing the flexibility of styles.
